credit_line: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment
title: "Exposicion Litografias, Galeria de Arte de la Universidad Nacional"
description: Image is dominated by a large eye looking toward the right with the words EXPOSICION 20 inscribed in black in the eye ball. The word LITOGRAFIAS is inscribed on the lower lid. At upper left the words Taller de / Grafica / Popular are shown in black. Across the lower section of the poster in black: GALERIA DE ARTE DE LA UNIVERSIDAD NACIONAL. Belowin red: DOLORES 11. - DEL 3 AL 13 DE MAYO.
name: Poster
